wysiwyg_a.p: This function block passes events of two selectable inputs to one common event output.

wysiwyg.p: If the 'G'-input is FALSE then all events from 'EI0' are passed to the 'EO'-Event output else all events from 'EI1' are passed to the 'EO'-Event output.
The status of the 'G'-input selects which event is passed to the output.
